Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application No. C 120403 ZMQ submitted by the CG & J Realty, LLC pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 10a, changing an existing R6 and C2-2 District to a C4-3 District, in the area of Northern Boulevard and Leavitt Street, Borough of Queens, Community Board 7, Council District 20.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
